author: lightclient
content: I'd like to cut a release for the Builder API tomorrow, so if you haven't had a moment to take a look at the PR - it's here: https://github.com/ethereum/builder-specs/pull/2

author: lightclient
content: Also, there is a dependency in `ethereum/beacon-apis` that would add a method for validator clients to submit a signed message stating their block building preferences. Any feedback on that would also be appreciated: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/209
